name: Ambar surrey restaurant & dhaba
address: 6914 King George Blvd, Surrey, BC V3W 4Z9, Canada

hasMenuItem.name: Ambar Surrey Kulcha
hasMenuItem.description: Flour bread stuffed with potatoes and minced onion baked in a clay oven and served with chana masala.

hasMenuItem.name: Chaat Papri
hasMenuItem.description: Crispy flakes mixed with chickpeas, potatoes, dipped in yoghurt, and topped with sweet and sour chutney.

hasMenuItem.name: Ambar Surrey Dal Makhni
hasMenuItem.description: Assorted lentils cooked with onion, ginger, garlic and finished with cream & butter.

hasMenuItem.name: Chicken Biryani
hasMenuItem.description: Chicken cooked in an aromatic long grain basmati rice with spices & herbs.

hasMenuItem.name: Ambar surrey SPL Veg Thali
hasMenuItem.description: A variety platter featuring creamy paneer curry, mixed vegetable curry, lentil dal, fragrant basmati rice, fresh salad, and soft naan bread.

hasMenuItem.name: Delhi Style-chole Bhature
hasMenuItem.description:
Ultimate breakfast of champions,
a complete satisfying meal

hasMenuItem.name: Chana Bhatura
hasMenuItem.description: Fried flour bread served with chickpea curry, spiced yoghurt and pickle.

hasMenuItem.name: Ambar Surrey Fish Pakora
hasMenuItem.description: Fried fish coated in chickpea flour and traditional spices.

hasMenuItem.name: Ambar Surrey Karahi Paneer
hasMenuItem.description: A melody of Indian style paneer, onion, peppers and tomato cooked gravy and exotic spices.

hasMenuItem.name: Butter Chicken
hasMenuItem.description: Boneless chicken tikka cooked with a rich tomato cream sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Ambar Surrey Shahi Paneer
hasMenuItem.description: Cottage cheese cooked with onion and creamy tomato gravy.

hasMenuItem.name: Aloo Puri
hasMenuItem.description:
A hearty, authentic vegan
breakfast. You will fall in love with it

hasMenuItem.name: KITTI KATY SHAKE
hasMenuItem.description: Treat yourself to our Kitti Katy Shake, a delightful blend of creamy vanilla ice cream and crunchy Kit Kat pieces. Topped with whipped cream, chocolate drizzle, and extra Kit Kat chunks, this shake is a chocolate lover's dream come true!

hasMenuItem.name: TUTTY FRUITI ICE CREAM
hasMenuItem.description: Delight in our Tutty Fruiti Ice Cream, a vibrant mix of creamy goodness and colorful fruit bits. Each scoop is bursting with the sweet and tangy flavors of assorted fruits, creating a refreshing and fun treat that’s perfect for any occasion.

hasMenuItem.name: Oreo Overloaded Shake
hasMenuItem.description: Dive into our rich and creamy Oreo Overloaded Shake, bursting with crushed Oreos, topped with whipped cream, chocolate syrup, and extra Oreo crumbles. A perfect treat for Oreo lovers!

hasMenuItem.name: KICK THE SNICKERS
hasMenuItem.description: Get ready to kick your cravings with our Kick the Snickers shake! This indulgent treat blends creamy vanilla ice cream with chunks of Snickers bars, topped with whipped cream, caramel drizzle, and crushed peanuts for an irresistible combination of flavors and textures.

hasMenuItem.name: VANILLA SHAKE
hasMenuItem.description: Experience the classic elegance of our Vanilla Shake, made with rich and creamy vanilla ice cream. This timeless favorite is blended to perfection and topped with a generous dollop of whipped cream. Simple, smooth, and utterly satisfying!

hasMenuItem.name: MANGO SHAKE
hasMenuItem.description: Savor the tropical bliss of our Mango Shake, made with ripe, juicy mangoes and creamy vanilla ice cream. This refreshing shake is a perfect blend of sweetness and richness, topped with a swirl of whipped cream for a delightful finish. It's a taste of paradise in every sip!

hasMenuItem.name: Paya Soup
hasMenuItem.description:
A traditional delicacy- warm,
soothing and delightful stew

hasMenuItem.name: Non-Veg SPL Thali
hasMenuItem.description: Enjoy chef's spl 2 non veg and 1 veg dishes comes with rice raita and gulab jamun

hasMenuItem.name: Ambar surrey SPL Veg Thali
hasMenuItem.description: A variety platter featuring creamy paneer curry, mixed vegetable curry, lentil dal, fragrant basmati rice, fresh salad, and soft naan bread.

hasMenuItem.name: Indo-Chinese Spl Thali
hasMenuItem.description: Enjoy our featured indo-Chinese thali that comes with manchurian, cheese chilli, ketchup, fried rice, noodles and 1 spring roll

hasMenuItem.name: INDO-CHINESE COMBO
hasMenuItem.description: our indo Chinese combo you can choose  Noodles with Manchurian or you can can choose fried rice with chili paneer

hasMenuItem.name: Non-Veg Platter
hasMenuItem.description: Our Non-veg Platter comes with chicken + lamb kebab,2 Pc Fish tikka, 2 Pc tandoori chicken, chicken wings

hasMenuItem.name: Veg Platter
hasMenuItem.description: Enjoy our veg platter comes with dahi kebab, hara bhara kebab, 2 flavour paneer tikka ,along with chap

hasMenuItem.name: Malai Soya Chaap
hasMenuItem.description: Soybean-based patties marinated in yoghurt and cream.

hasMenuItem.name: Chilli Panner
hasMenuItem.description: cubes of fried crispy paneer are tossed in a spicy sauce made with soy sauce, vinegar, chili.

hasMenuItem.name: Paneer Tikka
hasMenuItem.description: Cubes of Indian style paneer marinated in chef's special masala and cooked in tandoor.

hasMenuItem.name: Soya Chaap Tandoori
hasMenuItem.description: Soybean-based patties marinated in yoghurt and spices.

hasMenuItem.name: Veggie Noodles
hasMenuItem.description: Noodles with a stir fried veggies.

hasMenuItem.name: Manchurian
hasMenuItem.description: Dish made by roughly chopping and deep-frying ingredients such as, cauliflower (Gobi), nd then sautéing them in a sauce flavored with soy sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Pudina Panner Tikka
hasMenuItem.description: Paneer marinated with mint and spices, then grilled in a tandoor.

hasMenuItem.name: Achari Chaap
hasMenuItem.description: Soybean-based patties marinated in chief special masala with curd and cooked in tandoor.

hasMenuItem.name: Spring Rolls
hasMenuItem.description: wheat dough, filled with a shredded mixture of vegetables  served fresh or deep-fried.

hasMenuItem.name: Gobi Chilli
hasMenuItem.description: A fusion dish, chilli gobi is in which there is crispy, spicy, slightly sweet and sour tasting Cauliflower .

hasMenuItem.name: Vegetable Pakora
hasMenuItem.description: Pakora are crispy fritters made with vegetables like onions, potatoes, gram flour, spices and herbs.

hasMenuItem.name: Potato Veggies
hasMenuItem.description: Classic sides made with veggies and potatos.

hasMenuItem.name: Honey Chilli Potato
hasMenuItem.description: crispy Honey Chili Potatoes are a super addictive snack - fried potato fingers are tossed in a sesame honey chili sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Acchari Paneer Tikka
hasMenuItem.description: Paneer cubes marinated in yogurt and achari (pickle) spices, then grilled in a tandoor clay oven.

hasMenuItem.name: Achari Soya chap
hasMenuItem.description: Soybean chunks marinated in a tangy achari (pickle) masala, typically includes a blend of Indian pickling spices, then grilled to bring out rich flavors.

hasMenuItem.name: Samosa Channa
hasMenuItem.description: Triangle savory patties filled with spiced potato's and peas. Served with chutney.

hasMenuItem.name: Panner Pakora
hasMenuItem.description: Paneer pakora is a popular evening snack from North Indian cuisine. It is made by batter frying Indian cottage cheese aka paneer.

hasMenuItem.name: Dahi kabab
hasMenuItem.description: Dahi kabab translates to yogurt kababs where “Dahi” is a Hindi word for “Curd” (Indian yogurt) and “Kabab” here means a “Patty.

hasMenuItem.description: Fried fish coated in chickpea flour and traditional spices.

hasMenuItem.name: Kali Mirch Chicken Tikka

hasMenuItem.name: Ambar Surrey Chicken Pakora
hasMenuItem.description: Deep-fried with spices served with green chutney.

hasMenuItem.name: Seekh Kebab

hasMenuItem.name: Tandoori Prawn

hasMenuItem.name: Chicken Shashlik

hasMenuItem.name: Makhni Tandoori Chicken Full
hasMenuItem.description: Tender tandoori chicken pieces marinated in a rich butter masala, garnished with fresh cilantro, and served with sautéed bell peppers and onions.

hasMenuItem.description: Fried chicken wings with garlic hot sauce.

review.reviewBody: Butter Chicken is amazing here will be ordering again
Food was delicious and the quantity was decent. I want to make one suggestion to make the kofta's little bit smaller next time thanks!
Absolutely perfectly made the best North Indian food in Surrey
I ordered Desi haddi wala chicken and it was soo yummy.
Channa quantity is too low its just 5 table spoons waste of money
